GOLAM_WELCOME: Welcome, please leave a message after the beep
GOLAM_WELCOME_ALT: Sorry we do not take any message currently, please call again later
GOLAM_CHECK_NO_MESSAGE: Hello %s, no new messages. Have a good day !
GOLAM_RECORDING_OK: We got your message recorded. Have a great day !
GOLAM_RECORDING_FAILED: Sorry, we could not record your message. Please try again later
